name: Exeggutor
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It is called “The Walking Jungle.” If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an EXEGGCUTE.

attacks.name: String Bomb
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each basic Energy card attached to Exeggutor and to the Defending Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Nutritional Support
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 {G} Energy cards and attach them to any of your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.
